item.title: firewalld
item.description: firewalld 服务相关命令 运行停止 systemctl status | start | stop | restart firewalld 开机自启/禁止 systemctl disable | enable firewalld 常用命令 firewall-cmd –state # 显示状态 firewall-cmd –get-active-zones # 查看区域信息 firewall-cmd –get-zone-of-interface=ens33 # 查看指定接口所属区域 firewall-cmd –reload # 更新
